---
title: "Jumping between dimensions"
author: "Daniel Kaplan"
---

```{r goat-pitch-socks-setup, include = FALSE}
library(etude)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

Choose the correct term for ____ in each of the following:


```{r goat1, echo=FALSE}
askMC(
  "Velocity is the _____ of acceleration (w.r.t. time)?",
    "2nd deriv" = "",
    "deriv" = "",
    "+anti-deriv+" = "",
    "2nd anti-deriv" = "",
    "none of the above" = "",
  random_answer_order = FALSE,
  inline = FALSE
)
```

```{r goat2, echo=FALSE}

  "Position is the _____ of velocity (w.r.t. time)?",

    "2nd anti-deriv" = "",
    "none of the above" = "",
  random_answer_order = FALSE,
  inline = FALSE
)
```
